com.deezer.sdk.model

Class Permissions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deezer.sdk.model.Permissions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Parcelable, JsonEntity

    public class Permissions
extends Object
implements Parcelable, JsonEntity
    A class representing a set of permission for an application. This can be used to create the array needed in the DeezerConnect.authorize(android.app.Activity, String[], com.deezer.sdk.network.connect.event.DialogListener) method, or to represent the result of the user/permission request
    See Also:
    DeezerConnect.authorize(android.app.Activity, String[], com.deezer.sdk.network.connect.event.DialogListener), DeezerRequestFactory.requestCurrentUserPermissions()

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface android.os.Parcelable

    • Constructor Detail

      • Permissions

        public Permissions(boolean basicAccess,
                   boolean offlineAccess,
                   boolean email,
                   boolean manageCommunity,
                   boolean manageLibrary,
                   boolean deleteLibrary,
                   boolean listeningHistory)
        Creates a Permissions object by specifying which permissions to include. Set any parameter to true to include the corresponding permission
        Parameters:
        basicAccess - Access users basic information
        offlineAccess - Access user data any time
        email - Get the user's email
        manageCommunity - Manage users' friends
        manageLibrary - Manage users' library
        deleteLibrary - Delete library items
        listeningHistory - Access the user's listening history

      • Permissions

        public Permissions(JSONObject json)
            throws JSONException
        Creates an Permission object by parsing the json data fetched from Deezer webservice
        Parameters:
        json - the json object containing the permissions' data
        Throws:
        JSONException - when the provided JSONObject doesn't conforms to the expected format
